column1: Local Foods////I ordered the quinoa sandwich. Its smoked with hickory wood so it has a smokey flavor. The patty also has pinto beans and black lentils and my friend and I could taste a hint of cumin? Anyway
column2: the sandwich comes stacked. Meaning there is a generous amount of avocado and tomatoes in the sandwich. The sides that I got were kale and potatoe salad. I recommend the kale. It has pine nuts and golden raisins.
